        public Bounds2DFloat(float xMin,
             float yMin,
             float xMax,
             float yMax)
        Constructs a new object with the given values.
        Parameters:
        xMin - the lower boundary on the x coordinate.
        yMin - the lower boundary on the y coordinate.
        xMax - the upper boundary on the x coordinate.
        yMax - the upper boundary on the y coordinate.
